components.templateData:
<ng-template [hraViewOutlet]="viewRef()"> </ng-template>

<ng-template #contentTemplate>
  <ng-content select="hra-fullscreen-portal-content"></ng-content>
</ng-template>

<ng-template #dialogTemplate>
  <hra-expansion-panel [title]="title()" disabled>
    <hra-expansion-panel-actions>
      <ng-content select="hra-fullscreen-actions"></ng-content>
    </hra-expansion-panel-actions>

    <hra-expansion-panel-header-content>
      <button mat-icon-button mat-dialog-close>
        <mat-icon class="material-symbols-rounded"> close </mat-icon>
      </button>
    </hra-expansion-panel-header-content>

    <ng-template [hraViewOutlet]="viewRef()" data-testid="fullscreen-outlet"></ng-template>
  </hra-expansion-panel>
</ng-template>

variables.name: BODY_EXPANSION
variables.defaultValue:
trigger('bodyExpansion', [
  state('collapsed, void', style({ height: '0px', visibility: 'hidden', opacity: 0 })),
  state('expanded', style({ height: '*', visibility: '', opacity: 1 })),
  transition('expanded <=> collapsed, void => collapsed', animate(EXPANSION_PANEL_ANIMATION_TIMING)),
])
